definition: to go dining, wining, whoring and gambling/to lead a life of dissipation
to eat/to consume/to eat at (a cafeteria etc)/to eradicate/to destroy/to absorb/to suffer/to stammer (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [ji2])

sentences.english: Although her husband is as wicked as possible, she could do nothing but weep secretly all the time.
sentences.chinese: 丈夫吃喝嫖赌无所不为，她总是暗自垂泪却没有办法。

sentences.english: When Sancheng grew up, he indulged in eating, drinking, gambling, visiting prostitutes, and taking drugs.
sentences.chinese: 三成长大了，吃喝嫖赌吸样样都通。

definition: to spend one's time in drinking and pleasure (idiom); to indulge in sensual pleasures/life of debauchery
happy to partake but not prepared to do any work (idiom)/all take and no give
without learning or skills (idiom); ignorant and incompetent
lit. to enjoy the beautiful spring scenery (idiom)/fig. to frequent brothels/to sow one's wild oats
not to engage in honest work/to ignore one's proper occupation/not to attend to one's proper duties
a pack of rogues (idiom); a gang of scoundrels
to oppress the people/to act tyrannically

pinyin: luan4 gao3 nan2 nu:3 guan1 xi4
